name: cesium-buildings
description: visualize 3D textured geometries of your city from wfs sources
author: Oslandia
license: GNU Lesser General Public License version 2.1 or any later version

scripts.build: jshint js/*.js && npm run make_dirs && npm run cpy_cesium_assets && npm run build_worker && npm run build_goldcoast && npm run build_lyon
scripts.build_nocheck: npm run make_dirs && npm run cpy_cesium_assets && npm run build_worker && npm run build_goldcoast && npm run build_lyon
